author: bencomic

right.text: Did you question Jesus' parables like that too? Or Aesop's fables? Or any Dr. Seuss story?

left.text: weasel but you just made it all up and it doesn't make any sense. arbitrary analogies aren't analogies at all

right.text: Sigh, I'm going back to Smash Bros.

left.text: probably. weasel the only way that could even make sense is if you are high to begin with, right now

panels.narration: alternate title: how to win an argument, wildweasel style

right.text: at least i'm not high on weed.

left.text: yes, get high on smash brothers, then you'll be sane

title: sink or swim: law of the wildweasel, part 4
